#!/bin/bash ########################################################### # The script acts as a wrapper script to determine which Akamai # to clear in Staging Environment. # Developed By: Chinmay Bhatawdekar (C.B) ###########################################################
AKUSER=saksapi AKPWD=t0uchd0wn1 AKTYPE=cpcode AKACTION=invalidate AKDOMAIN=production AKURL=https://api.ccu.akamai.com/ccu/v2/queues/default echo "Akamai Content Clear" PURGEOPTS='{ "type" : "'${AKTYPE}'", "action" : "'${AKACTION}'", "domain" : "'${AKDOMAIN}'", "objects" : ["525143","510555","525140","510556"] }'; curl $AKURL --proxy "lt-proxy.digital.hbc.com:80" -H "Content-Type:application/json" -d "${PURGEOPTS}" -u "$AKUSER:$AKPWD"

#!/bin/bash ########################################################### # The script acts as a wrapper script to determine which Akamai # to clear in Staging Environment. # Developed By: Chinmay Bhatawdekar (C.B) ###########################################################
AKUSER=saksapi AKPWD=t0uchd0wn AKTYPE=cpcode AKACTION=invalidate AKDOMAIN=production AKURL=https://api.ccu.akamai.com/ccu/v2/queues/default echo "Akamai Content Clear" PURGEOPTS='{ "type" : "'${AKTYPE}'", "action" : "'${AKACTION}'", "domain" : "'${AKDOMAIN}'", "objects" : ["510556","525140"] }'; curl $AKURL --proxy "lt-proxy.digital.hbc.com:80" -H "Content-Type:application/json" -d "${PURGEOPTS}" -u "$AKUSER:$AKPWD"

####################################### # Refresh Promo Service #######################################
for i in 1 2 3 4 5 6; do echo "HOST promoservice-${i}"; curl "http://prodlatpromoservicedeploy-promoservice-${i}.inst.prod-lt.hbc-digital-1.cns.digital.hbc.com:9520/v1/promo-service/refresh" sleep 15 done
curl "http://prod-lat.digital.hbc.com/tool/loadPromoHashmap.jsp?bmForm=promo_hashmap_loader"

#!/bin/bash ########################################################### # The script acts as a wrapper script to determine which Akamai # to clear in Staging Environment. # Developed By: Chinmay Bhatawdekar (C.B) ###########################################################
AKUSER=saksapi AKPWD=t0uchd0wn1 AKTYPE=cpcode AKACTION=invalidate AKDOMAIN=production AKURL=https://api.ccu.akamai.com/ccu/v2/queues/default echo "Akamai Content Clear" PURGEOPTS='{ "type" : "'${AKTYPE}'", "action" : "'${AKACTION}'", "domain" : "'${AKDOMAIN}'", "objects" : ["426598"] }'; curl $AKURL --proxy "lt-proxy.digital.hbc.com:80" -H "Content-Type:application/json" -d "${PURGEOPTS}" -u "$AKUSER:$AKPWD"

####################################### # Refresh Promo Service #######################################
for i in {1..2}; do echo "HOST promoservice-${i}"; curl "http://previewlatpromoservicedeploy-promoservice-${i}.inst.preview-lt.hbc-digital-1.cns.digital.hbc.com:9520/v1/promo-service/refresh" sleep 15 done
curl "http://prev-lat.digital.hbc.com/tool/loadPromoHashmap.jsp?bmForm=promo_hashmap_loader"

####################################### # Refresh Blue Martini Service #######################################
for i in {1..2}; do curl "hd1rxx3${i}lx.digital.hbc.com:7010/BMCache.jsp?bmcache_action=clear_all" sleep 15 done

#!/bin/bash ########################################################### # The script acts as a wrapper script to determine which Akamai # to clear in Staging Environment. # Developed By: Chinmay Bhatawdekar (C.B) ###########################################################
AKUSER=saksapi AKPWD=t0uchd0wn1 AKTYPE=cpcode AKACTION=remove AKDOMAIN=staging AKURL=https://api.ccu.akamai.com/ccu/v2/queues/default echo "Akamai Content Clear" PURGEOPTS='{ "type" : "'${AKTYPE}'", "action" : "'${AKACTION}'", "domain" : "'${AKDOMAIN}'", "objects" : ["426599"] }'; curl $AKURL --proxy "lt-proxy.digital.hbc.com:80" -H "Content-Type:application/json" -d "${PURGEOPTS}" -u "$AKUSER:$AKPWD"

#!/bin/bash ########################################################### # The script acts as a wrapper script to determine which Akamai # to clear in Staging Environment. # Developed By: Chinmay Bhatawdekar (C.B) ###########################################################
AKUSER=saksapi AKPWD=t0uchd0wn1 AKTYPE=cpcode AKACTION=invalidate AKDOMAIN=staging AKURL=https://api.ccu.akamai.com/ccu/v2/queues/default echo "Akamai Content Clear" PURGEOPTS='{ "type" : "'${AKTYPE}'", "action" : "'${AKACTION}'", "domain" : "'${AKDOMAIN}'", "objects" : ["387444","525138"] }'; curl $AKURL --proxy "lt-proxy.digital.hbc.com:80" -H "Content-Type:application/json" -d "${PURGEOPTS}" -u "$AKUSER:$AKPWD"

####################################### # Refresh Promo Service #######################################
for i in {1..2}; do echo "HOST promoservice-${i}"; curl "http://qalatpromoservicedeploy-promoservice-${i}.inst.qa-lt.hbc-digital-1.cns.digital.hbc.com:9520/v1/promo-service/refresh" sleep 15 done
curl "http://qa-lat.digital.hbc.com/tool/loadPromoHashmap.jsp?bmForm=promo_hashmap_loader"

####################################### # Refresh Blue Martini Service #######################################
for i in {1..2}; do curl "hd1qxx3${i}lx.digital.hbc.com:7010/BMCache.jsp?bmcache_action=clear_all" done
